title: Which universities feel like a liberal arts college? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many universities might be classified as liberal art college such as the major universities in DC area Georgetown, George Washington, and American University. The three of them are good in humanities and law but they are almost have no STEM programs, George Washington and Georgetown have medical schools but that consider as secondary focus for them. Another universities have the same humanity in New England including two Ivy League universities Dartmouth College and Brown University as well as none Ivy League universities Boston College. They're primarily focused on humanities for undergraduates, and they are well known for that!

These are some of the premier institutes in the liberal arts in India: Jadavpur University, KolkataJawaharlal Nehru University, DelhiPresidency University, KolkataUniversity of HyderabadDelhi University
